films.title: Paddington in Peru
films.plot: Paddington travels to Peru, the country of his origins, where he embarks on a fun-filled adventure while trying to find a special gift for his Aunt Lucy’s birthday.

films.title: The Amateur
films.plot: After his wife is killed in a London terrorist attack, a brilliant but introverted CIA decoder takes matters into his own hands when the agency refuses to act.

films.title: A Minecraft Movie
films.plot: Four misfits are pulled into the Overworld, a strange, blocky realm, and must team up with expert crafter Steve to find their way home.

films.title: From the World of John Wick: Ballerina
films.plot: During the events of John Wick: Chapter 3, Eve Macarro trains in the assassin ways of the Ruska Roma.

films.title: Warfare
films.plot: A Navy SEAL platoon’s surveillance mission goes wrong in hostile territory, unfolding in real time as a true story of warfare and brotherhood.

films.title: Mickey 17
films.plot: Unlikely hero Mickey Barnes lands a job where dying is just part of the job description.

films.title: Snow White
films.plot: After the benevolent King vanishes, Princess Snow White flees the Evil Queen’s wrath and, with seven magical dwarves and a young bandit named Jonathan, fights to reclaim the kingdom.

films.title: Black Bag
films.plot: When agent Kathryn Woodhouse is accused of treason, her husband must choose between loyalty to his country or to his wife.

films.title: Sinners
films.plot: Twin brothers return home to escape their past, only to find a greater evil awaiting them.

films.title: Mission: Impossible – The Final Reckoning
films.plot: Ethan Hunt and the IMF team race against time to stop the AI known as the Entity, which has infiltrated global intelligence networks, while being pursued by governments and a ghost from Ethan’s past.
